text: “me nam mage puruwe karumayak wennata athi.
paleyi dihawe dakune wyaparikayin idam milata aran wishala polwathu aarambha karamin thiyenawa.
daruwan athi demapiyan mita wada samaja danuma owunta dima athyawashyayi.
samaharek dan nidahas wi pamina sitithi.
siwurakuth dagena gas nanginta puluwaniya?

me salli nikan dipuwa neweyi.ape wyapruthiwalata dipu naya mudala athule thibunu ee nayema kotasak.api muluratama thawath parampara ganak me naya gewanna oona.

japanaye okinawahidi pawathi 2012 - antharjathika ru rajina tharagayen shri lankawe madhusha mayadunne menawiya thewani sthanaya himikaragena atha.lokaye sama ratakinma 52 wani jathyanthara ru rajina tharangaya sandaha tharuniyan idiripathwu athara eeye (21) pawathi awasan tharagaya sandaha idiripathwu tharangakariyan 68 deneku athurin shri lankawe madhusha mayadunne thewani sthanaya himikaragena thibena atharaehi palamu sthanaya japanaye ikumi yoshimatshu wisin himikaragena thibe.me tharangawaliye dewani sthanaya finlanthaye wiwi suminentada siwuwani sthanaya dominiyan rajyaye telodiya mirwisinda himikaragena atha.1960 wasaredi aarambha kala jathyanthara ru rajina tharagawaliya me dakwa warshikawa pawathwana athara hondama mithrashili tharagakariya, hondama idiripath kirima, hondama jathika anduma menma hondama chayarupayata peni sitima aadiya wenuwenda mehidi sammana himiwiya.madhusha mayadunne menawiya indiyawa, amerikawa, engalanthaya ratawalin adhyapanaya laba thibena athara aya shri lanka nawika hamudawe jyeshta niladhariyakuge diyaniyaki..
mandayath samahara jathin hora rahase sanwidhanaya wana bawa nodanna seya.
loku kuda hamotama ekata wadi wela me prasangaya balanna puluwan.
ee weddi tikak ra wela.
eka blog lipiyaka thibudeyak matha pihitamin eyama thawath lipi kihipayakata ek karayi.
yanthamata ema si.di. eka hoyagatha hakiwuye nugegoda suparmakat eke torana si.di. alewi haleni.
fatta hapi ban mathara gana liyana ekek hambuna nisa..
"ge peni peni kadeta kanna giyanan honda wadak karanawa, yamu yamu, gedara udeta kanna hadala athi!"
danata thibena sisitiwi darshana anuwa ee mohothe sopanaye sitinuye safinath soyuriyathya.

amathiwarayath thamage lagama gnyathiwariyak chandeta dala thibuna.anthimata thaththa ee gnyathiwariyata sapot..mama ee pakshema ara gnyathiwariyata prabhala abhiyogayak una pudgalayata sapot.dennama udeta gedarin pitath wela depaththata yanawa.habayi wenasakata thibune thaththa payin yanawa mawa ekka yanna wan kabalak enawa.mokada ee wenakota mata pawarila thibunu rajakariya thamayi ara pudgalaya wenuwen pracharaka katayuthu korana eka.ithin ude nawaya withara wenakota pikar bandapu wan eka awith mawa aragena yanawa..mama magadi mage yalu kolle dethun denekuth patawa gannawa.eeta passe apekshakathumage meheyum karyalayata gihin udeta kala postar mitiyi, pappa haliyakuyi burusu deka thunakuyi aragena kastiya ekka pitath wenawa.ethana indala ithin kalin khedala dunna parawal osse wan rathaya gaman karanawa..mama kata ridenakalma ithin ara apekshaka thumage warunawa yakada katen kiyagena yanawa.
ada athamun janathawata balaya bedanna kiyanawa.
ee awastha dekehidima eewa ahase aathata nopeni gos yalith awuth thibe.

sisun kridapitayata kandawa owunta ath osawa dana gasa sitina lesa ana keruni (pituwa 56) shri lanka hamudawa satankami sahodariyan hisa harunu atha diwagena giya bawath, owungen thuwala walata shrilanka hamudawa prathamadhara laba di gewal walata pitath kala hari bawath (pituwa 122) digadura wihidum balakaya apiwa wismayata path kala prahara ella kaleya (pituwa 184) ukthayen sandahan kara aththe thamilani jeyakkumaran wisin liyana laduwa, saminadan wimal wisin pariwarthanaya karana lada thiyunu asipathaka sewana yata nam kruthiye saranshayayi yuddhaya bihisunuya.
